Package CONTROLLER

Class C_start

java.lang.Object
CONTROLLER.C_START
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_C_start
public class C_start
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_C_start
C_start is the basic controller, that is always created first. Its only purpose is to handle USER-IO during the start sequence

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static C_start controllerStart  
    (package private) M_import m__import  
    (package private) I_V_start viewStart  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private C_start()
    creates Object of Class C_start creates the startwindow of the programm viewStart and makes it visible it passes itself as C_start controllerStart into the main and therefore creates a reference to itself in the viewStart

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static C_start getInstance()
    this method checks if controller was already created if it wasn't it creates a new controller it always returns a reference to the controller
    void notifyCreate()
    this message gets called by Views to notify the start CONTROLLER that a new project should be created the CONTROLLER therefore asks the viewStart for a path where the new project should get created after getting the path the CONTROLLER has to close viewStart (hide) and pass the job of handeling the project to the newly created controllerFrame
    void notifyOpen()
    notifyOpen()
    void notifyShow()
    this method shows the viewStart and tells the Start CONTROLLER, that he is in charge now

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static C_start getInstance()
      this method checks if controller was already created if it wasn't it creates a new controller it always returns a reference to the controller
      Returns:
      reference to controller

    • notifyCreate

      public void notifyCreate()
      this message gets called by Views to notify the start CONTROLLER that a new project should be created the CONTROLLER therefore asks the viewStart for a path where the new project should get created after getting the path the CONTROLLER has to close viewStart (hide) and pass the job of handeling the project to the newly created controllerFrame
      Specified by:
      notifyCreate in interface I_C_start

    • notifyOpen

      public void notifyOpen()
      notifyOpen()

      this message gets called by Views to notify the start CONTROLLER that a existing project should be opened the CONTROLLER therefore asks the viewStart for a path to the file that should be opened

      Specified by:
      notifyOpen in interface I_C_start

    • notifyShow

      public void notifyShow()
      this method shows the viewStart and tells the Start CONTROLLER, that he is in charge now
      Specified by:
      notifyShow in interface I_C_start
